name: Love, Death and PvP
summary: From average high schooler to powerful hero—you've just become a member of the strongest party in the newest VRMMORPG, Inferno, after accidentally kill-stealing from one of the most powerful players. Join forces with a selfish but strong dark knight, a kind mage who tends to go overboard, and a self-proclaimed treasure hunter with social anxiety, and embark on a journey to defeat the final boss!
